recipes.title: Breakfast Taco Ring

winePairing.pairingText: Tacos can be paired with Pinot Noir, Riesling, and Sparkling rosé. Acidic white wines like riesling or low-tannin reds like pinot noir can work well with Mexican dishes. Sparkling rosé is a safe pairing too. The Beaux Freres The Beaux Freres Vineyard Pinot Noir with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 56 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Beaux Freres The Beaux Freres Vineyard Pinot Noir
productMatches.description: Shows dark plum/garnet with some amber and orange at the edge. The nose shows roasted herbs and meatiness with some background notes of sweet cherry, truffle and vegetal qualities. This is a distinctive Pinot Noir with aromatics that are very old-world. In the mouth the wine has always had a certain austerity but a bit of a gap in the middle. The wine has held up nicely over time but has never really developed the sweetness and charm that we would expect of our best Pinot Noirs.

recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 375.Whisk the eggs, milk, salt, pepper and hot sauce in a medium bowl.In one skillet over medium heat, add the eggs and scramble.In another skillet over medium heat, crumbled and cook the turkey sausage.Once the eggs are scrambled and the sausage is cooked through, add the sausage and shredded cheese to the scrambled eggs and toss everything together.Form a ring with the crescent rolls by placing a small glass on the center of a baking stone then staggering the crescent rolls around the glass with the wide ends overlapping in the center.Add the egg sausage mixture to the middle of the crescent roll ring around the cup.Remove the glass from the middle and roll the dough up and over the eggs & sausage.Place the roll in the oven for 20-25 minutes.

steps.step: Whisk the eggs, milk, salt, pepper and hot sauce in a medium bowl.In one skillet over medium heat, add the eggs and scramble.In another skillet over medium heat, crumbled and cook the turkey sausage.Once the eggs are scrambled and the sausage is cooked through, add the sausage and shredded cheese to the scrambled eggs and toss everything together.Form a ring with the crescent rolls by placing a small glass on the center of a baking stone then staggering the crescent rolls around the glass with the wide ends overlapping in the center.
Add the egg sausage mixture to the middle of the crescent roll ring around the cup.
Remove the glass from the middle and roll the dough up and over the eggs & sausage.
Place the roll in the oven for 20-25 minutes.
